WorkItem.ClosedComment: No it doesn't.  See http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=54155 and CalculationsHealadin.cs line 343.  15% it is.
WorkItem.Description: The talent Judgement of the pure increases the haste of 20 % instead of 15 %.
WorkItem.Summary: Judgement of the pure - Holy Paladin talent

Comments.Message: In fact it is strange. In the tab "Stats", "Spell Haste" increases by 20 % when we add 5 points in the talent. But in the detail of the spells, "Holy Light" has a correct incantation time (with 15 %).
